sentences.en: A third radiation group was unaffected by the magnetic field.
sentences.cn: 第三组射线不受磁场的影响.

sentences.en: He smiled, apparently unaffected by her formal tone.
sentences.cn: 他微笑着, 对她冷漠的语调毫不在意.
她那从容而自然的举止

sentences.en: Her laughter was so unaffected, so incredulous, that the officers were impressed.
sentences.cn: 她笑得那么自然, 表现得那么不相信迈克尔杀人的事.

sentences.en: His language was natural , unaffected , distinctively vivid, humorous and strongly charming.
sentences.cn: 语言既朴实无华,又鲜明生动, 幽默而富有艺术魅力.

sentences.en: One of the rays may be absorbed while the other is unaffected.
sentences.cn: 两光线之一被吸收而另一光线不受影响.
对葡聚糖的胞饮作用无影响.

sentences.en: She's kind and honest and unaffected.
sentences.cn: 她心地善良,人为诚恳而坦率.

sentences.en: Such simple unaffected trust flabbergasted me.
sentences.cn: 这种简单、真挚的信任使我吃惊.

sentences.en: The house was unaffected by the strong wind.
sentences.cn: 那栋房子未被强风吹动.

sentences.en: The incisive , cultured but unaffected voice matched Peat - Smith's ingenuous appearance.
sentences.cn: 皮特 -史密斯 开门见山,彬彬有礼, 而又不失于矫揉造作的话语同他那幅真诚的表情很相称.

sentences.en: The unhurried way in which he spoke and the gentle smile on his lips reminded you of an unaffected young girl.
sentences.cn: 他那慢条斯理的样子和款款浅笑的神情,简直像个志成敦厚的大姑娘.

sentences.en: There are some defects that leave the stoichiometry unaffected.
sentences.cn: 有一些缺陷是离开了化学计量关系造成的.

sentences.en: These birds seem unaffected by climate.
sentences.cn: 这些鸟似乎不受气候的影响.

sentences.en: They will carry the virus but will be unaffected by it.
sentences.cn: 他们的体内将携带艾滋病病毒但是不受影响.

words.tran_cn: 不受影响的；自然的；真挚的；不矫揉造作的

trans.tran_cn: 不受影响的，不装扮的，无装饰的，自然的，不矫揉造作的
trans.tran_en: not changed or influenced by something
